duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَالصَّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi was-salatu was-salamu 'ala Rasulillah. Allahummaf-tah li abwaba rahmatik.
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَالصَّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi was-salatu was-salamu 'ala Rasulillah. Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik.
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

title: After Wudu (Ablution)
instructions: After completing wudu, recite the following.

duas.arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ، اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ التَّوَّابِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
duas.transliteration: Ash-hadu an la ilaha illAllahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh. Allahummaj'alni minat-tawwabeena waj'alni minal-mutatah-hireen.
duas.translation: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah alone, with no partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger. O Allah, make me among those who repent and make me among those who purify themselves.

duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila Rabbina la-munqalibun. Allahumma inna nas'aluka fi safarina hadha al-birra wat-taqwa wa minal-'amali ma tarda.
duas.translation: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it. And to our Lord we will surely return. O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness, piety, and deeds that please You.
In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushoor.
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after causing us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.

title: Sayyid al-Istighfar
instructions: The master supplication for seeking forgiveness. The Prophet (peace be upon him) said whoever says it with conviction in the morning and dies that day enters Paradise.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ وَأَبُوءُ لَكَ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta Rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduk, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata't, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana't, abu'u laka bini'matika 'alayya wa abu'u laka bidhanbi faghfir li fa'innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant.
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord. There is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant. I am faithful to my covenant and my promise to You as much as I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your blessings upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for none forgives sins except You.

title: Dua for Distress
instructions: When feeling distressed, anxious, or overwhelmed — especially in crowded areas.

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَرَبُّ الْأَرْضِ وَرَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيمِ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illAllahul-'Atheemul-Haleem. La ilaha illAllahu Rabbul-'Arshil-'Atheem. La ilaha illAllahu Rabbus-samawati wa Rabbul-ardi wa Rabbul-'Arshil-Kareem.
duas.translation: There is no god but Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no god but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no god but Allah, Lord of the heavens and earth and Lord of the Noble Throne.

title: Morning & Evening Protection
instructions: Recite in the morning and evening for protection.

duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwas-samee'ul-'aleem.
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in the heavens can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
duas.note: Recite 3 times in the morning and 3 times in the evening.

title: After Every Prayer
instructions: Dhikr to recite after completing the obligatory prayers.

duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ (٣٣) الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ (٣٣) اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ (٣٣) لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: SubhanAllah (33x), Alhamdulillah (33x), Allahu Akbar (33x). La ilaha illAllahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer.
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah (33x), All praise is for Allah (33x), Allah is the Greatest (33x). There is no god but Allah alone with no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is capable of all things.
